alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Cooper; Henry; Howard; Johnson; Pettis; Randolph; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:53PM CST until December 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARITON...SOUTHERN RANDOLPH...HENRY...PETTIS... HOWARD...SALINE...COOPER AND SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 752 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Keytesville to near Marshall to near Windsor, moving northeast at 80 mph. Spotters reported multiple sheds and fences down in the town of Warrensburg as the storms moved through. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Marshall, Clinton, Boonville, Windsor, Knob Noster, Fayette, Slater, Sweet Springs, Glasgow, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, New Franklin, Pilot Grove, Smithton, Higbee, Green Ridge, Calhoun, Otterville and Deepwater. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 64 and 114. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Chariton; Cooper; Henry; Howard; Johnson; Pettis; Randolph; Saline
